attributes.additional_details: The present incumbant of No 10 was not elected by the people of this country and therefore should not assume the confidence of the people.
attributes.background: Call an election to allow the public to vote for our next Prime Minister

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781

Hold a General Election within 100 days of the new PM being appointed: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621931

A General Election gives constituents the opportunity to vote for their local MP, but in the UK the Prime Minister is not directly elected. The Prime Minister is normally the leader of the party that wins the most seats at a general election.
